head.supplied: Albert Road ¶ 31/1/77 ¶ ¶ Let me express, dear Mr Newbery, my best thanks to you for the generous exertions made by you with Mr William's help, in getting ready such an important lot of articles of v...

div.p: Unit 4, VPRS 4363/P Industrial and Technological Museum miscellaneous correspondence 1877, VA 912, Trustees of the Public Library, Museums and National Gallery, inwards correspondence unregistered, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Let me express, dear Mr Newbery, my best thanks to you for the generous exertions made by you with Mr William's help, in getting ready such an important lot of articles of vegetable origin for the Amsterdam-Exhibition.
Internationale Koloniale en Uitvoerhandel Tentoonstelling [International Colonial and Export Trade Exhibition],Amsterdam, 1883. Pray convey to the trustees also my best thanks for the liberal spirit, in which they also met my wishes in this respect, and assure them, that I will see a fair "quid pro quo" returned from Dr Oudemans, the Director of the bot Garden of Amsterdam.
